meanings.definition: A bar with a loop at one or both ends for lifting or securing heavy objects.
meanings.sent1: The workers used eyebars to lift the heavy crates onto the truck.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew relied on eyebars to secure the steel beams in place.
meanings.sent3: The eyebars decided to take a break from lifting and went on strike.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as an eyebar, never giving up on her goals.
meanings.sent5: The shiny eyebars gleamed in the sunlight as they hoisted the equipment effortlessly.
